item.title: Screenplay: The Foundations of Screenwriting Review
item.description: Disclaimer First of all, by NO means I am a “specialist” on the topic and I am NOT evaluating the book as a specialist would do. Here is only my humble opinion that is based on my personal preferences and because of that it may diverge from yours. So no hard feelings, OK? So let’s get back to business! Background According to wikipedia, this book was first published in 1979 and it was written by Syd Field.

item.title: LOTR - Fellowship of the Ring Review
item.description: Disclaimer First of all, by NO means I am a “specialist” on the topic and I am NOT evaluating the book as a specialist would do. Here is only my humble opinion that is based on my personal preferences and because of that it may diverge from yours. So no hard feelings, OK? So let’s get back to business! Background The Fellowship of The Ring was released in June 29, 1954.

Hi, My name is Bruno Gabriel Lebtag Lebtag. I am a Brazilian Computer Scientist and Light Novelist. I am also a fluent English speaker. I started coding with 16 years and since then I couldn’t stop anymore. I love what I do and I can’t picture myself being or doing anything else. I consider myself a polyglot and polymath. I am currently learning german (although I can’t speak yet) and I’m also taking a Master’s in Software Architecture.
